pages.text: Mechanical crafters are Create's solution to automating the production of advanced devices.$(br2)You'll need a lot. They function by holding an item in their single slot; when all Mechanical Crafters in an array have an item, they'll mash them together with the same precision a Player can.

pages.name: Mechanical Crafters
pages.text: Hey look, a crafting bench. But who says it needs to be 3x3? Make whatever shape you need!

If you need empty spaces in a crafting array and don't (or can't) just remove those crafters from the array, try using a Slot Cover! Made from a piece of brass plate, these fit snugly on a Mechanical Crafter's slot and won't be moved during assembly.
